attributes.action: Call for the dismissal of Maria Miller as an MP
attributes.additional_details: Culture Secretary Maria Miller unlawfully claimed over £90,000 for mortgage payments on her second home. She then tried to use her position to cover up this gross breach of trust. This petition calls for her to be dismissed from the House of Commons and to force her to pay back EVERY PENNY of the expenses which she illegally claimed.

rejection.details: This is a party political matter and not for Government
